data.name: Unique upgrade method of the strongest mage
data.detailed_description:
If you like this game, please add it to your wishlist~

Summary of the plot:

The Gerrit Ministry of Magic is a mysterious existence, where qualified children are secretly received for training,
Continue to take the exams and weed out, leaving the best people to become the great magicians. Monte is the best student among these people.
As the secret treasure of Gerrit’s Ministry of Magic was stolen, the high priest sent Monte to investigate with three lovely female companions.
Before leaving, the high priest told the three girls a secret-Monte can pass magic through body fluids and become stronger!
Make magic power stronger through body fluids? This is how it happened?
In this way, the adventure of Monte and the cute girls begins~

Character introduction:

Pandora：

The water magician, likes blue very much, likes the male protagonist, and has always admired him~

Kath：

Magic swordsman, very good at attacking, superb swordsmanship, admiring the hero, always shy when facing him~

Cecilia：

Magic warrior, strong defense, has a sense of responsibility, likes to protect everyone, silently likes the male protagonist for a long time~

Game features:

  • Go on an adventure with the protagonist and gain love on the way.
  • Easy to use turn-based combat with rich strategies.
  • Various professions and unique skills, each profession has powerful nirvana.
  • The monsters who avoid by walking, choose to fight relatively freely.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel GMA Graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks

content_descriptors.notes:
- This Game may contain some sex implications not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
- The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.
